casebody.data:
Clark, next friend, v. Flannery & Co. May 13, 1895.

Brought forward from the last term.

Petition for injunction. Before Judge Smith. Pulaski county. January 12, 1895. W. L. & Warren Grice, for plaintiff. J. H. Martin, for defendants. Atkinson, J.

On the facts disclosed by the record, there was no error in denying the injunction. Judgment affirmed.
